summary:
Half Dragon Follower:
- Standalone
- Selectable two skeleton (Digitigrade / Plantigrade)
- There is female ver (Svelka) as option file
- Not Lore-Friendly
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=3]I'm not a native English speaker. The following sentences was written by machine translation.[/size][/b]

[size=4][color=#f9cb9c]Race mod is available (Plantigrade skeleton only).[/color]
 -> [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72416/]Half Dragon Race[/url][/size]

[b]31/05/17:[/b]
[color=#a2c4c9]I'm afraid I don't take any requests now because this mod update is almost over.
Thank you for your understanding in advance.

Please refer to "FAQ" (see below) if you need some help.
It covers the answer for frequently asked question.[/color]

[Attention]
[u]Svelk and Svelka cannot exist in the game at the same time because them sharing ID.
If you want to exchange they, please overwrite by other one.[/u]

[Summary]
Half Dragon Follower:
- Standalone
- Selectable two skeleton (Digitigrade / Plantigrade)
- There is female ver as option file
- Not Lore-Friendly

[Known Issues]
(Digitigrade ver)
- When he equip some helms, it does not appear correctly.
- When he equip some gauntlets, it does not appear correctly.
- When he equip mod equipments which not supported for beast races, it does not appear correctly.
It is occurred by setting Argonian Race at Armor Race of his race, but can't keep compatible with Argonian Raptor without that.
Therefore, I regard It as specifications. If you mind it, please use Plantigrade ver.

(Both ver)
- His horn is protrude outwards from helm.
It's in the specifications. I have no plan fixing it. 

[Installation]
Locate the data folder in your Skyrim installation directory. 
(I'm recommending use of Mod Organizer for mod management easy.)

[Permission]
[b][color=#e06666]- Do not post this mod the somewhere else without permission.
- Do not reupload this mod and claim them as your own.
- Do not use his face data or head mesh (including preset file) for your mods.
- Do not use this mod as resources warehouse.[/color][/b]

[Highly Recommended]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19283/]Argonian Raptor Feet [/url]by J Hamilton or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51097/]Digitigrade Beast Races Full DLC Edition[/url] (When use Digitigrade ver)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303/]Female Facial Animation[/url] by nao4288 (When use Svelka)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/]Face light[/url] by tktk

[Information]
Name: Svelk Vorpal-Blade / Svelka Vorpal-Blade
Race: Half Dragon (but he was born as Nord)
Level: 10-99, Autoleveled
CombatStyle: Custom (At close range: attack with weapon. At middle or long range: attack with shout.)
MainSkills: 2H Sword, Block, Light Armor
Ability: Ice form (It was customized to reduce possibility of friendly-fire), Frost breath, Unrelenting Force, Resist Frost(+50%), Gift of the blood*1 
Perks: Deep Wounds, Devastating Blow, Great Critical Charge, CustomFit
Protected: yes (Not Essential, Protected only)
Marriageable: yes
Voice type: MaleEvenToned / FemaleEvenToned
Location: A small camp nearby "Wreck of the Brinehammer" (Direction of slightly left from the Fast-Travel point.)
BackStory: He/She was absconding from hometown at the time of the 15-year-old because his/her skin have been started covered with tiny scales suddenly. After that, he/she traveled for follow up the tradition of dragonborn for many years. However, his/her body had already become like a dragonewt when he/she arrived at Skyrim. So he/she thought he should go middle of nowhere to avoid observation. For this reason, he live in there alone now.

*1 Unique Abilty. Resist Poison(+50%) and Recast of shout reduce 90%.

[FAQ]
[color=#a2c4c9]Q. He/She hasn't dialogue for talking.[/color]
A. Please save the game and reload it.

[color=#a2c4c9]Q. Marriage or engage with him/her is not working well.[/color]
A. This trouble is quite common. The reason why is that the marriage system of vanilla has many bugs. Please google it for details.
    (This mod never editing records and scripts about the marriage system so I'm sure that the cause does not lies in this mod.)

    A common way to solve:
   - You can prevent that by installing ”Unofficial Patches” or ”Marriage Mod - To Have And To Hold”.
     As stated previously, I highly recommend installing it in advance if you planned marriage with him.
   - Please save game before marriage or engage, and when problem occurred, redo from there.

[color=#a2c4c9]Q. He/She doesn't wear gear I gave...[/color]
A. Probably, He will not equip gears that has lower defense than his starting gear. This is by design of vanilla.
    Some follower management mod (e.g. AFT) has the function that remove starting gear from follower.
    Let's check it out on the Internet.

[color=#a2c4c9]Q. I want to change his/her body type (or underwear).[/color]
A. Since I have no plan to add variation, please try yourself.
    It is necessary to replace the files manually.
      His/Her meshes of body: meshes \ actors \ character \ Svelk \
    Please search for instructions.

[color=#a2c4c9]Q. Do you have a plan for release his/her preset?[/color]
A. No.

[color=#a2c4c9]Q. Is this mod compatible with SSE?[/color]
A. Maybe.


[Credit]
Bethesda
